name: One is All v2
description:
*If you are having issues/bugs, please try playing in a different browser, or downloading!

In this game, your life lives on in whatever has eaten you (human, bird, or poison flower). Learn the cycle and find the lotus in each level.

This is an updated version of One is All, my entry into the third Extra Credits Game Jam. Any and all comments/feedback are greatly appreciated!

Controls:

Arrow keys/WASD to move, Spacebar to jump. R to reload level.

Credits:

  • The cave background is from opengameart.org, from user PWL. URL here: https://opengameart.org/content/seamless-cave-background
  • The background music is from freesound.org. The track name is "My love", and the artist name is Shady Dave. The song can be found here: https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/325611/
  • The cave tiles are from opengameare.org, from user Buch. Artist page can be found here: https://opengameart.org/users/buch
